column4: hmm, I just finished installing Gusty, and my sound doesn't work...
I have an Audigy sound card
my sound doesn't work too, I got 2 sound cards
did you make sure your onboard sound is off?
one of your soundcards is on the motherboard, right?
yes, though it worked before turning it off to go to bed, and I restarted it a couple of times
ahh, hmm, well, make sure its disabled in your Bios :P
neither of your soundcards work either though?
yep, and there's no option like that in my bios (I can't make anything out of italian though), but they both work on windoze and they did work before
I'm using xubuntu btw, but I guess it doesn't really matter, the core is the same
I'm looking at that right now
lol welcome... didn't work for me though :( :( :(*
